title: Flag of Switzerland
cardDescription: The flag of Switzerland consists of a red flag with a white cross in the center. It is one of only two square sovereign-state flags, the other being the flag of Vatican City.
description: The flag of Switzerland consists of a red flag with a white cross in the center. It is one of only two square sovereign-state flags, the other being the flag of Vatican City.

content.content: Only the dimensions of the cross are formally established since 1889: 'The coat of arms of the federation is, within a red field, an upright white cross, whose four arms of equal length are one and a sixth times as long as they are wide.'
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 19, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 2, sab, sc 11, sba, sc 3, turn
Ch 1, sc 2, sab, sc 11, sba, sc 3, turn
Ch 1, sc 2, sab, sc 11, sba, sc 3, turn
Ch 1, sc 2, sab, sc 11, sba, sc 3, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 7, turn
